name: Emile's Journey
description:
Emile's Journey

Emilie is endowed with extraordinary inventiveness. One can even say that she is a bit the inventor of the cartoon. Intelligent and hardworking, he marked the history of animation by inventing Prani... Prixa... uuhhh... Praxinoscope!

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the end of the 19th century! Wander the streets of Paris and overcome the steps to take your invention to the Universal Exhibition of 1878.

Grab your tophat and turn on your gramophone. Let's go!

Play with the mouse
